'''House Swyft''' is a vassal house that holds fealty to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. Their seat is [[Cornfield]], located north-east of [[Crakehall]] and south of [[Clegane's Keep]]. They are landed knights rather than a full noble house.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/cornfield/]</ref>

Its sigil is a blue bantam rooster on yellow.
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Swyft is counted as a strong vassal and ally of House Lannister. However, [[Tyrion Lannister]] considers Ser Harys to be a chinless craven and lickspittle of little worth. Dorna is described as "equally chinless" as her father.

House SwyftÂ joined their LannisterÂ lieges in siding with King [[Aegon II Targaryen]]Â during the Dance of the Dragons. Â At this time they were a full [[noble house]], but by the time the series begins they are a [[Knightly House|knightly house]]. How the SwyftsÂ lost their lordship is unknown.â€‹

===Members===
* Ser Harys Swyft, the Knight of Cornfield
** His eldest daughter, [[Dorna]]. Married to Ser [[Kevan Lannister]].
** His son and heir, Ser Steffon Swyft.
*** His daughter, Joanna Swyft.
** His youngest daughter, Shierle Swyft.
